concept.title: Link Layer Utilities Overview
concept.shortdesc: This topic describes the Link Layer Utilities collection.

section.title: Architecture
section.p: The Link Layer Utilities collection contains the Extensible Authentication Protocol (EAP) framework component. It works with the Point-to-Point Protocol to authenticate network connections.

section.title: Components
section.p: The EAP Framework provides support for EAP. EAP is a universal authentication framework for Ethernet type bearers.
